hero.description: Self-taught developer passionate about creating modern and efficient web solutions.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a Full Stack Developer passionate about technology and problem-solving. I combine a solid foundation in Python and modern web development with a constant ability to learn and adapt to new tools.

My training at IMMUNE Technology Institute has specialized me in the JavaScript stack (React, Node.js, Next.js) and databases, complemented by knowledge in system administration and cybersecurity. I focus on creating efficient, scalable, and well-documented solutions.

contact.title: Let's Talk?
contact.description: Do you have an idea or project? Let's work together to make it happen.
